CMultiXEvent Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for CMultiXEvent:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

CMultiXEvent is the base class for all events in MultiX. If the application wishes to generate events, it should derive a class from CMultiXAppEvent which is derived from this class.


Public Member Functions

EventCodes EventCode ()
 The code used by the application for the event.
